Articles.Content:
Maybe I'm on the late train, but steam should ask me to authorize any updates... And I don't see a release newsletter anywhere.

Did it update? Maybe KSP will load all 14 mods before somebody answers...

Nope. Just a hotpatch to steam to remove the 64-bit version.

EDIT: Source: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115127-Steam-is-updating-KSP-Bye-bey-64Bit

Aww.

Why is everybody talking about 1.0 like it's already came out?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115127-Steam-is-updating-KSP-Bye-bey-64Bit

Bah, ninjedit.

Edited April 10, 2015 by Frybert
nijedited

Why is everybody talking about 1.0 like it's already came out?

Hm? It just entered Experimentals (essentially closed final testing), which means it should be out soon (2-3 weeks, as far as I know)

It hasn't come out yet, though.

Hm? It just entered Experimentals (essentially closed final testing), which means it should be out soon (2-3 weeks, as far as I know)

It hasn't come out yet, though.

Add a week or three for extra thorough experimenting, because there's a lot that has changed and it is the official release version. The latter point means reviewers are not going to hold back their ire if there are any serious bugs left in.
